Html:
Hi,

this must be the most noobish question you've ever seen, but it's quite crucial...

I downloaded and unzipped the htmlagilitypack... Since there aren't any dll files, I thought: I'll publish it first and use that dll. However, I'm using Visual Studio C# Express to open HtmlAgilityPack.sln, but it needs to convert it first. When I accept it, It sais that "solution folders are not accepted in this version of  the application. Solution folder 'samples' will be unavailable."
After this, I tried publishing this to use the dll, but it won't work...

Can please someone explain to me what to do to get me started ? It would be greatly appreciated !!!

Thanks !
You should be able to open the project in VS, pass through the message boxes you were prompted with, and then build the project to create the library.
